nrutil.h

00001 /* CAUTION: This is the ANSI C (only) version of the Numerical Recipes
00002    utility file nrutil.h.  Do not confuse this file with the same-named
00003    file nrutil.h that is supplied in the 'misc' subdirectory.
00004    *That* file is the one from the book, and contains both ANSI and
00005    traditional K&R versions, along with #ifdef macros to select the
00006    correct version.  *This* file contains only ANSI C.               */
00007 
00008 #ifndef _NR_UTILS_H_
00009 #define _NR_UTILS_H_
00010 
00011 static float sqrarg;
00012 #define SQR(a) ((sqrarg=(a)) == 0.0 ? 0.0 : sqrarg*sqrarg)
00013 
00014 static double dsqrarg;
00015 #define DSQR(a) ((dsqrarg=(a)) == 0.0 ? 0.0 : dsqrarg*dsqrarg)
00016 
00017 static double dmaxarg1,dmaxarg2;
00018 #define DMAX(a,b) (dmaxarg1=(a),dmaxarg2=(b),(dmaxarg1) > (dmaxarg2) ?\
00019         (dmaxarg1) : (dmaxarg2))
00020 
00021 static double dminarg1,dminarg2;
00022 #define DMIN(a,b) (dminarg1=(a),dminarg2=(b),(dminarg1) < (dminarg2) ?\
00023         (dminarg1) : (dminarg2))
00024 
00025 static float maxarg1,maxarg2;
00026 #define FMAX(a,b) (maxarg1=(a),maxarg2=(b),(maxarg1) > (maxarg2) ?\
00027         (maxarg1) : (maxarg2))
00028 
00029 static float minarg1,minarg2;
00030 #define FMIN(a,b) (minarg1=(a),minarg2=(b),(minarg1) < (minarg2) ?\
00031         (minarg1) : (minarg2))
00032 
00033 static long lmaxarg1,lmaxarg2;
00034 #define LMAX(a,b) (lmaxarg1=(a),lmaxarg2=(b),(lmaxarg1) > (lmaxarg2) ?\
00035         (lmaxarg1) : (lmaxarg2))
00036 
00037 static long lminarg1,lminarg2;
00038 #define LMIN(a,b) (lminarg1=(a),lminarg2=(b),(lminarg1) < (lminarg2) ?\
00039         (lminarg1) : (lminarg2))
00040 
00041 static int imaxarg1,imaxarg2;
00042 #define IMAX(a,b) (imaxarg1=(a),imaxarg2=(b),(imaxarg1) > (imaxarg2) ?\
00043         (imaxarg1) : (imaxarg2))
00044 
00045 static int iminarg1,iminarg2;
00046 #define IMIN(a,b) (iminarg1=(a),iminarg2=(b),(iminarg1) < (iminarg2) ?\
00047         (iminarg1) : (iminarg2))
00048 
00049 #define SIGN(a,b) ((b) >= 0.0 ? fabs(a) : -fabs(a))
00050 
00051 void nrerror(char error_text[]);
00052 float *fvector(long nl, long nh);
00053 int *ivector(long nl, long nh);
00054 unsigned char *cvector(long nl, long nh);
00055 unsigned long *lvector(long nl, long nh);
00056 double *dvector(long nl, long nh);

00059 int **imatrix(long nrl, long nrh, long ncl, long nch);

00061         long newrl, long newcl);
00062 float **convert_matrix(float *a, long nrl, long nrh, long ncl, long nch);
